docs.snippet: ALTHOUGH "California Suite" marked Walter Matthau's fourth performance in a Neil Simon film and his fourth under the direction of Herbert Ross, it wasn't any bed of  roses, Mr.Matthau said, sighing with remembered pain....
docs.lead_paragraph: ALTHOUGH "California Suite" marked Walter Matthau's fourth performance in a Neil Simon film and his fourth under the direction of Herbert Ross, it wasn't any bed of roses, Mr.Matthau said, sighing with remembered pain.

headline.main: At the Movies; 'California Suite' was far from plush for Walter Matthau.

docs.snippet: An indictment returned yesterday aocused two teen-agers of the sledgehammer murder of an 84-year-old Bronx widow last month. District Attorney Mario Merola of the Bronx said that Miguel Cruz, 18 years old, who lived in the same building as the vic...
docs.lead_paragraph: An indictment returned yesterday aocused two teen-agers of the sledgehammer murder of an 84-year-old Bronx widow last month. District Attorney Mario Merola of the Bronx said that Miguel Cruz, 18 years old, who lived in the same building as the victim, and Oscar Arroyo, 15, had been charged with murder, arson, burglary and robbery in connection with the Dec. 10 killing.
docs.abstract: Benedix, Augusta: Miguel Cruz, 18, and Oscar Arroyo, 15, held for murder-robbery of Augusta Benedix, 84, Bronx (S)
